title: raw_checksum does not encode key for apiv2
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### What version of TiKV are you using?
v6.1.0 & master

### What operating system and CPU are you using?
<!-- If you're using Linux, you can run `cat /proc/cpuinfo` -->

### Steps to reproduce
1. run with client-go and run checksum cmd.
2. key is not in region error occurs.

### What did you expect?

raw checksum cmd can succeed.

### What did happened?
`raw_checksum` does not encode key for apiv2
